ValidationRule.description: Req 5544 - Validation rule update for AP2019 changes for Opportunities
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR($RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Direct_Record_Type', $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Indirect_Record_Type'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Lead_BU__c ,'NE IoT') && IF(INCLUDES(Supporting_BUs_NEN__c, "NE IoT"),true,false),ISPICKVAL(Lead_BU__c ,'NE DAaaS') && IF(INCLUDES(Supporting_BUs_NEN__c, "NE DAaaS"),true,false),ISPICKVAL(Lead_BU__c ,'NE EOP') && IF(INCLUDES(Supporting_BUs_NEN__c, "NE EOP"),true,false)),$Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Supporting BUs (NEN) and Lead BU cannot have same values.
